name: Sloppy Joe Tater Tot® Casserole
author: KelseyS
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (32 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir beef in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Drain any fat and set beef aside
Saute onion and garlic in the same skillet until translucent, 3 to 5 minutes
Add corn and bell pepper; cook until soft, 5 to 10 minutes
Stir in Sloppy Joe sauce, cream cheese, paprika, salt, and pepper
Simmer over medium-low heat until sauce is heated through, about 5 minutes
Pour the beef mixture into a 9x13-inch baking dish and spread evenly
Arrange potato nuggets over the top
Sprinkle remaining Cheddar cheese on top
Bake in the preheated oven until the potato nuggets are crispy and golden, about 25 minutes
